= Vim/insert =

== Entering insert mode ==
* `i` - insert *before the cursor*
* `I` - insert at *the beginning of the line*
* `a` - append *after the cursor*
* `A` - append *at the end of the line*
* `o` - append a new line *below the current line*
* `O` - append a new line *above the current line*

== Exit insert mode == 
* `<C-c>` 
* `<C-[>`
* `Esc`

== Completion ==
* `<C-n>` - *next* completion
* `<C-p>` - *previous* completion
* `<C-x><C-f>` - *file* completion
* `<C-x><C-l>` - *line* completion
* `<C-x><C-s>` - *spelling* suggestion

== Foo ==
* `<C-A>` - insert previously inserted text
* `<C-h>` - delete the character before the cursor
* `<C-w>` - delete the word before the cursor
* `<C-j>` - begin new line
* `<C-m>` - begin new line
* `<C-r>` - insert contents of a [[vim/registers|register]]
* `<C-t>` - insert one shift-width of indent at the start of the current line
* `<C-d>` - delete one shift-width of indent at the start of the current line
* `<C-g> u` - break undo sequence, start new change

== Scrolling ==
* `<C-x><C-e>` - scroll window one line up
* `<C-x><C-y>` - scroll window one line down
